name: Commander Keen 3: Keen Must Die!
description:
Commander Keen 3: Keen Must Die! is an action, arcade and platformer game developed by id Software. It came out on 01-01-1990. Apogee Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Commander Keen 3: Keen Must Die! is available on PC.
John Romero and Tom Hall produced the game. It was directed by John Romero and Tom Hall.
